item.title: The Trump Organization is now selling ‘Trump 2028’ hats
item.description: Sales once again raises question of Trump's intentions.

item.title: Children’s skincare products could contain a hidden danger, study finds
item.description: Children's skin and hair products may contain harmful chemicals that could potentially put their health and development at risk.

item.title: Banks getting the upper hand on card fraud but social scams getting worse, Mastercard says
item.description: AI is changing the cybersecurity game both for crooks and those protecting consumers.

item.title: Phoebe Gates ‘did not expect to be a founder.’ Now she’s building the shopping assistant Phia with Sophia Kianni
item.description: Their new shopping assistant is inspired by Google Flights.

item.title: Inside the Target CEO meeting with Black leaders amid the company’s DEI rollback and the boycott that followed
item.description: “It did not come up to all that we're expecting or needing.”
